abilities.desc: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals 200% damage to creeps.
abilities.name: Paralyzing Cask
abilities.notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

abilities.desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units and damaging enemies for 100% of the heal value, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
abilities.name: Voodoo Restoration

abilities.desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
abilities.name: Maledict
abilities.notes: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.

abilities.desc: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.
abilities.name: Voodoo Switcheroo

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of [8] seconds. Death Ward has 50% bonus accuracy.
abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.notes: Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.
